channel.title: Paradox-PK - BACK!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=4]Paradox-PK[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
Hello! Welcome to Paradox-Pk BETA! We are a PVP loving community with a PvM background and a great Developer and Owners! We are looking for players and staff, and are currently just opening the server! So if you are looking for new and inviting features, then join us today!! We have: a 100% custom target system with EP -custom weapons -pvp points/upgrade points to upgrade your items -Custom Slayer system -Random item drops + High Risking -New Updates daily! -Just like 2012 with some Customs! -Dual Wielding Drygores and much more. A more in-depth description is coming soon!
Thanks!
[URL=http://"http://paradox-pk.com"]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://paradox-pk.com/forum"]Forum[/URL]
